How do we structure the day?

1. Traning

We teach all the necessary things to jump from the plane without any kind of problem

2. Get ready

You are already prepared, you just need a suit and a parachute. All sizes available

3. Fly

You are ready, and the plane is waiting for us in the hangar. Let's fly!

4. Jump!

You have done the most complicated. Just one step left... jump!

Team

Our team have collectively 70 years of experience. Odds are, when you jump out of the plane with these professionals, you won't go splat.

Harold Rothstein
